name: Pre-sewn Waldorf Doll Body
description:
Pre-sewn Waldorf Doll Bodies are available in several different styles and sizes. Each pre-sewn body comes marked, sewn, cut out and trimmed so it is ready for stuffing, final closing and assembly of the doll. Please choose the style and skin tone from our drop down menu. The doll bodies are available in either our Regular Doll Skin Fabric or our Premium Doll Skin Fabric. See the pictures for all of the colors available. These Doll Bodies are based on the patterns of Joy's Waldorf Dolls. Pattern & directions and not included but are available for purchase here:
Doll Patterns

We highly recommend that you use matching skin colored thread to complete your doll. The matching sewing threads are available here:
Doll Patterns

Bulk Discounts are available on purchases over 30 doll bodies.

name: Ballet Outfit Kit for Waldorf Dolls
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own Ballet outfit for your Waldorf Doll. The kit comes complete with supplies to make your choice of 1 Ballet Outfit in sizes to fit either 10/11", 13/14" or 16" dolls. Ballet outfits for dolls are always popular and this kit makes it easy to make your own. SKILL LEVEL: This kit is designed for someone with prior sewing knowledge. KIT INCLUDES: * Fabric for Ballet Suit, Shoes & Hair Scrunchie (your choice of color) * Fabric for Tights * Tulle for Ballet Skirt * Novelty Braid Trim for Neck & Waist * Matching Ribbon * Velcro * Elastic * Joy's Pattern for this outfit. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete this outfit, shoes and scrunchie in 3 different sizes. When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: Choose the Ballet Suit, Shoes & Scrunchie fabric color from the drop-down menu. This outfit is also available as a finished product. Please contact us for more information. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General sewing tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this outfit. Such as Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape, Ball Point Pins, matching thread. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Doll not included. This kit is for the materials to make the Ballet outfit only. Please contact us if you require further information.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Ballet Outfit Sewing Pattern
description:
Make adorable Ballet Outfits for your Waldorf Dolls. 

Pattern includes 3 sizes of Ballet Outfits.  Included are complete detailed instructions to make the Ballet Suit, Tights, Shoes and Hair Scrunchie for 10/11", 13/14" & 16" Dolls.

For a list of materials needed to complete these outfits, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this outfit available for purchase.
Please see our SUPPLIES category or purchase a complete KIT to make this outfit.

name: Lopi Wool Waldorf Doll Hair Yarn
description:
This is the beautiful LOPI Wool that so many Doll Makers love to use.

A gorgeous and soft wool yarn perfect for creating a variety of hair styles. This yarn is also a favorite for felting.

It is made of 100% Icelandic Virgin Wool and comes in a 1.75 oz. (50 gram) skein.  Each skein is approximately 109.3 yards (100 meters) long.

Suggested Knitting needles: 4½-5mm (US 7-8)

Comes in variety of yummy hair colors.

Colors can show up differently on each device. If color matching is important, please order one of our Hair Yarn color swatch cards. Also see our extra pictures by clicking the arrows under the pictures.

name: Cotton Knit Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric - 20 Yard Bulk Bolt
description:
Cotton Knit Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric
100% Cotton
Width: 60 inches (153 cm) Tubular
11.5oz weight per linear yard
20 yard Bolt (18.3m)

Purchase a 20 yard bolt of our Regular Doll Skin fabric and pay only $9.99 per yard!

Bulk Bolts are not examined before shipping. There may be an occasional flaw in the fabric. Accepting this is part of the discount price.

Our Regular Doll Skin Fabric is made of high quality 100% Cotton Interlock Knit Fabric. It is 60" (153cm) wide in a tubular knit.

This fabric has been made especially for Waldorf Doll Making and has a perfect weight, a moderate stretch, a pill-resistant finish and stuffs up wonderfully.  This fabric is also free of harmful chemicals.

When choosing a color, remember that the shade of the fabric gets lighter on a doll once it's stuffed.

****IMPORTANT SHIPPING NOTE****  Please note that the shipping price in the cart will be approximate.  We will adjust the shipping to reflect actual shipping charges as shipping rates vary drastically from state to state/province to province as this is a bulk item.

name: Cotton Knit Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric
description: Cotton Knit Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric 100% Cotton Width: 60 inches (153 cm) Tubular 11.5oz weight per linear yard Our Regular Doll Skin Fabric is made of high quality 100% Cotton Interlock Knit Fabric. It is 60" (153cm) wide in a tubular knit. This fabric has been made especially for Waldorf Doll Making and has a perfect weight, a moderate stretch, a pill-resistant finish and stuffs up wonderfully. This fabric is also free of harmful chemicals. When choosing a color, remember that the shade of the fabric gets lighter on a doll once it's stuffed. Choose from 1/2 yard or 1 yard cuts. For multiple yard cuts, we cut in one continuous piece. For example if you purchase 3 quantity of 1 yard Tan, we will send you a 3 yard Tan piece. Choose from 1 yard or 1/2 yard cuts in the drop-down menu. Full yards are $12.99. Half yards are $6.99. ** Save Money ** This fabric is available on 20 yard Bolts at a discounted price. Check our "Bulk Prices & Wholesale" Page. We also carry the full selection of DeWitte Engel's skin fabric as our Premium Doll Skin Fabric.

name: Bamboo Crochet Hook
description:
Bamboo crochet hooks are soft and warm to the touch and 60% lighter than aluminum hooks.  Stitches glide smoothly over bamboo which becomes smoother to the touch the more it is used. 

These Bamboo Hooks are great for making crochet wig caps and other hair styles for your dolls.

Available in two sizes:

* Size F or 5 (3.75mm)
* Size G or 6 (4.0mm)

name: Doll & Teddy Bear Joints
description:
Strong Doll & Teddy Bear Joints for creating movable arms and legs on Dolls, Teddy Bears and other stuffed Toys.

Each package contains a set of 2 joints (4 pieces total)

Available in two sizes:

* 30 mm (1.24 inches)
* 45 mm (1.77 inches)

name: Little Loops Mohair Boucle Waldorf Doll Hair Yarn
description:
This is a nice & soft Mohair Boucle yarn in perfect little loops.  Great for creating little curls on your doll's hair.

Boucle yarn is great for creating lovely wigs for your dolls.  The boucle loops provide excellent coverage making this a favorite yarn to use for multiple types of wigs.  

This yarn is hand-painted/hand-dyed in small batches.  Color variations from lighter to darker shades are normal throughout the skein in some cases creating a variegated effect.  Just like regular hair.  

It is made of 78% Mohair, 13% Wool and 9% Nylon and comes in a 1.75 oz. (48-50 gram) skein. 

Colors can show up differently on each device.  If color matching is important, please order one of our Hair Yarn color swatch cards.  Also see our extra pictures by clicking the arrows under the pictures.

name: Tessa Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
A complete kit to make this adorable Tessa Waldorf Doll.

Tessa has bendable/pose-able limbs.
 
This doll kit comes complete with Doll Skin Fabric, Yarn for the Hair, Wool Stuffing, Eye Thread. The kit also contains pattern pieces and detailed instructions for making the doll.  Instructions & patterns for the knitted wig and clothing are included as well.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, thread, scissors.

This kit is recommended for those with doll making experience.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

Finished Doll measures approx. 12" (30 cm) in height.

name: Tomte my Friend Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
A complete kit to make this Tomte my Friend Doll.

Tomte is very strong and can easily be dressed and undressed.

This doll kit comes complete with Doll Skin Fabric, Nicky Velour, Wool Stuffing, Eye Thread, Wool for beard, elastic. The kit also contains pattern pieces and detailed instructions for making the doll.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, thread, scissors.

This kit is recommended for those with doll making experience.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

Finished Doll measures approx. 17.5" (45 cm) in height.

name: Slow Snail Weighted Doll Making Kit
description:
A complete kit to make this cute Slow Snail Doll.

This doll kit comes complete with Doll Skin Fabric, Nikki Velour, Wool Stuffing, Eye Thread, Shaping Rope, Pipe Cleaner. The kit also contains pattern pieces and detailed instructions for making the doll.

In order to complete this doll you will require 11 oz (300 grams) of weighted filling material such as Millet or Spelt.  You can also use sand, glass beads or poly pellets. These are not included in this kit.  

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, thread, scissors.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

Finished Doll measures approx. 12.5" (32 cm)

name: Pierlala Doll Making Kit
description:
A complete kit to make this cute Pierlala Doll.

This doll kit comes complete with Doll Skin Fabric, Terry Fabric, Wool Stuffing, Eye Thread and Spelt for filling.  The kit also contains pattern pieces and detailed instructions for making the doll.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, thread, scissors.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

Finished Doll measures approx. 33.5" (85 cm) long

name: Heart Baby Doll Kit
description:
This soft cuddly doll is perfect for your wee one to snuggle up to when teething or napping!

This doll kit contains enough jersey, fabric and wool stuffing to complete your own little doll.

Please note that the printed fabric for the hat may vary but will still match with the rest of the doll fabric.

Pattern templates & detailed instructions are included as well.

To make the kit you will also need thread, scissors and a hand sewing needle which are not included.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel. 

8" (20 cm) baby cuddle doll

name: 19" Baby Jess Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 19" Baby Jess Waldorf doll. This baby doll that can wear newborn clothes! Baby Jess weighs almost 3 1/2 pounds (1500 grams) and sits all by her/his self. The need to have weighted dolls is in more demand than ever. SKILL LEVEL:This is a Kit for the Advanced doll maker. KIT INCLUDES: * Cotton Doll Skin Fabric * Inner Head Tubing * Hair Yarn * Embroidery floss for eyes & mouth (Black, Blue, Green, Brown & Pink) * Wool Stuffing * Craft String and Neck Tying string to form the head * A Stuffing Stick * Joy's Pattern for this doll & clothing. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles. The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older. **This Doll will require 2lb (907gr) of weighting material. Joy recommends using Sand in order to add weight to the Doll but you can use alternative weighting materials as well. The sand is not included in your kit. Your kit will include information on the type of sand needed or alternative materials to add weight your doll** The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.
****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: 1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. If you require a pre-made wig for this kit, please contact us for details. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General doll making tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this doll. Such as 3" & 5" Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape (or Joy's Copper Head Frames), Ball Point Pins, #7 Embroidery Needles, matching thread, Beeswax Blush and a Crochet hook for the wig. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls 19" Baby Jess Dollmaking Sewing Pattern
description:
19" BABY JESS WALDORF DOLL MAKING PATTERN

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 19" Baby Jess Waldorf inspired Doll.

This baby doll that can wear newborn clothes! 
Baby Jess weighs almost 3 1/2 pounds (1500 grams)
and sits all by her/his self. The need to have weighted dolls is in more demand than ever. This is a pattern for the advanced doll maker. It comes with a pattern for the footy sleeper and hat, diaper and 8 baby style wig making directions with comprehensive, photo step-by-step images.

For a list of materials needed to complete this doll, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this doll available for purchase. 
Please see our SUPPLIES category or purchase a complete KIT to make this doll.

name: Sewing Thread for Doll Skin Fabric
description:
All Purpose Sewing Thread to match all of our Doll Skin Fabric Colors.

Spools are 110 - 150 yards (100-137m) in length.

options.name: De Witte Engel T105 LIGHT BROWN
De Witte Engel T108 WARM YELLOW

name: Sewing Thread for Hair Yarns
description:
All Purpose Sewing Thread to match all of our Hair Colors & Types.

Spools are 110 yards (100m) in length.

name: Sewing Thread for Velour Fabric
description:
All Purpose Sewing Thread to match all of our Velour Fabric Colors.

Spools are 110 yards (100m) in length.

name: Embroidery Floss for Velour Fabric
description:
Embroidery Floss to match all of our Velour Colors.

Used in many Waldorf Bunting Baby Patterns as well as Joy's 10" & 6" Velour Bunting Baby pattern.

Each skein is made up of 6 strands of high quality 100% Cotton floss and is 8.7 yards (8m) in length.

name: Buttons for Jointed Waldorf Dolls
description:
Clear Buttons used for Button Jointed Dolls.

Set of 4, which completes one doll.

Available in 2 sizes:

1/2" used for smaller dolls or Joy's 9" Tiny Button Baby

5/8" used for larger dolls or Joy's 16" Button Baby and 16" Button Child

name: Eco Wool Batting for Stuffing Waldorf Dolls
description: A wonderful soft and clean wool batting. 100% Wool. Perfect for stuffing dolls, forming the doll heads, stuffing toys and for felting. Also great for using as the inner core when needle felting. This high-quality Eco-Wool is exceptionally clean of pesticides and chemicals and sustainably grown. ** ON SALE ** Regular Price $24.99 per pound. You will need about: 1/2 pound for a 14" Doll (35cm) 3/4 pound for a 16" Doll (40cm) 1 pound for a 18"-20" Doll (45cm-50cm) Available in 3 sizes: 1/4 pound or 4oz (113g) 1/2 pound or 8oz (226g) 1 pound or 16oz (453g) ** Shipping Note ** Wool Batting can be bulky and expensive to ship due to the volume size. Occasionally, the shipping charged in our shopping cart will not cover the actual shipping cost. Please note that we would contact you, should the shipping you paid not be enough. As usual, if you paid more shipping than what it costs to ship, we will refund the extra.

name: Wool Roving Strips for Waldorf Doll Head Making
description:
Some Doll Makers prefer to use Wool Roving strips when forming the Doll Head instead of wool batting. And then they use Wool Batting for the remainder of the doll body.

These 100% wool roving strips have been washed, combed and carded into long splinters for the purpose of forming a doll head.  This wool can also be used for stuffing dolls and other toys.

Available in 3 sizes:
1/4 pound or 4oz (113g)
1/2 pound or 8oz (226g)
1 pound or 16oz (453g)

** Shipping Note **  Wool stuffing can be bulky and expensive to ship due to the volume size.  Occasionally, the shipping charged in our shopping cart will not cover the actual shipping cost. Please note that we would contact you, should the shipping you paid not be enough. As usual, if you paid more shipping than what it costs to ship, we will refund the extra.

name: Craft Thread for Waldorf Head Making
description:
Very strong thread and yet thin enough to thread in a needle for sewing, stringing the button-jointed dolls and of course, shaping the facial features of the inner doll head.

Highly recommended by Joy Chambers for use with her patterns.

Spool of 200 yards.

name: Doll Stand
description:
Display your doll with this versatile doll stand.

Wire stand holds your doll up straight, perfect for show or playtime

Two piece adjustable metal doll stand.  Wire arms fit either under dolls arms or around dolls waist depending on height.

Available in two sizes:
Small 3-1/2" (8.9cm) - Fits dolls between approximately 5" - 9" in height (13cm-23cm)
Large 7-1/2" (19cm) - Fits dolls between approximately 8-1/2" - 16" in height (21.5cm-41cm)
Extra Large 9-1/2" (24cm) - Fits dolls between approximately 10-1/2" - 19" in height (26.6cm-48.5cm)

The Large size & Extra Large sizes also fit American Girl Dolls.

name: Schmetz Universal Sewing Machine Needles
description:
Package of 5 Schmetz Universal Sewing Machine Needles.

Available in 3 sizes:

Size 60/8
Size 70/10
Size 90/14

Can be used to sew on most woven and knit fabrics.

Joy Chambers recommends a Size 70/10 Universal Needle to be used with her patterns.

What do the numbers mean?  The first number shown above is the European size number.  The second would the the American size.  The higher the number, the thicker the needle.  The type & thickness of your fabric would determine which size needle you want to use.

name: Schmetz Ball Point Sewing Machine Needles 70/10
description:
Package of 5 Schmetz Ball Point Sewing Machine Needles.

Size 70/10

Recommended for sewing on knit fabrics such as Doll skin fabric.  Ball point needles penetrate between the fibers of the fabric, not through the fibers like a sharp needle therefore preventing holes and snags along the seams.

name: #7 Embroidery Needles
description:
Package of 16 Embroidery Needles, Size 7.

These needles are used for embroidering the eyes of your Waldorf doll and can also be used to sew doll bodies together.

These are the Embroidery needles called for in Joy's Waldorf Doll patterns.

name: Ball Point Hand Sewing Needles
description:
A set of 10 Ball Point Hand Sewing Needles.  

These are perfect for sewing together various doll parts.  The ball point end gently pushes the knit loops apart of the doll skin fabric to prevent the fabric from getting pierced.

name: Ball Point Pins for Waldorf Doll Making
description:
These pins are perfect for pinning together pieces of knit doll skin fabric due to their ball point ends.  They are also a must have for pinning soft doll parts together while assembling a doll, pinning on the doll's wig for correct placement and essential when designing your doll's face.

Pins are available in two sizes:

REGULAR Size. Package of 100 Pins.  These are our Regular Ball Point Pins

EXTRA FINE Size. Package of 175 Pins.  These are Extra Fine Ball Point Pins.

name: 5" Doll Making Needles
description:
5 inch Doll Making Needles.

Set of 2 needles.

Used for sewing on eyes and mouths on the dolls.  

Also work well for tying quilts.

name: 3" Doll Making Needles
description:
3 inch Doll Making Needles.

Set of 6 needles.

Great for all soft sculpting, smaller dolls and attaching wigs.

name: Teething Baby Doll Waldorf Kit
description:
A cute soft cuddly teething doll.  Perfect to snuggle with!

This doll kit contains the supplies along with the pattern and instructions.

Finished doll size: 25 cm baby cuddle toy

To make the doll you will also need scissors and a hand sewing needle which are not included along with other basic sewing supplies.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

name: Cotton Neck Tying String for Waldorf Doll head
description:
This is a thick & very strong cotton string perfect for neck tying when making Waldorf doll heads.

20 yards (18.2m)

name: Cotton Inner Head Tubing for Waldorf Dolls BULK DISCOUNT ROLLS
description: ** FULL ROLLS ** Discounted Bulk Price 100% Cotton stretchy knit tubing used for making the inner part of a Waldorf doll head. These are full rolls of either Gauze Tubing or Stockinette Tubing and come in 25 yard or 50 yard lengths. We have both the gauze tubing and the stockinette tubing available. If you are using gauze tubing, it is recommended that you use a double layer for any dolls sized 12" or larger. The stockinette tubing is a bit thicker and heavier and will be more supportive than the gauze and will only require 1 layer. If you are using any of our Joy's Waldorf Doll patterns, the patterns will call for stockinette tubing for any dolls sized 9" or larger. Tubing Widths needed for Doll Sizes: GAUZE TUBING: 5/8 inch (2-3" Dolls) 7/8 inch (4-6" Dolls) 1 inch (8-10" Dolls) 1-1/2 inch (12-16" Dolls) 2 inch (18-20" Dolls) STOCKINETTE TUBING: 2 inch (9-16" Dolls) 3 inch (18-20" Dolls)

options.name: 5/8" Wide Gauze Tubing - 50 yard Bulk Roll
7/8" Wide Gauze Tubing - 50 yard Bulk Roll
1-1/8" Wide Gauze Tubing - 50 yard Bulk Roll
1-1/2" Wide Gauze Tubing - 50 yard Bulk Roll
2" Wide Gauze Tubing - 50 yard Bulk Roll
2" Wide Stockinette Tubing - 25 yard Bulk Roll
3" Wide Stockinette Tubing - 25 yard Bulk Roll

name: Cotton Inner Head Tubing for Waldorf Doll Making
description: 100% Cotton stretchy knit tubing used for making the inner part of a Waldorf doll head. We have both the gauze tubing and the stockinette tubing available. Available by the yard. (Also available by the roll in our "Bulk Prices & Wholesale" section.) If you are using gauze tubing, it is recommended that you use a double layer for any dolls sized 12" or larger. The stockinette tubing is a bit thicker and heavier than the gauze and will only require 1 layer. If you are using any of our Joy's Waldorf Doll patterns, the patterns will call for stockinette tubing for any dolls sized 9" or larger. For multiple yard cuts of the same type & width, we cut in one continuous piece. For example if you purchase 3 quantity of 1 yard 2" Stockinette we will send you a continuous 3 yard piece. ** Save Money ** Both the gauze and the stockinette tubing are available to purchase as full rolls. Check our "Bulk Prices & Wholesale" Page. Tubing Widths needed for Doll Sizes: GAUZE TUBING: 5/8 inch (2-3" Dolls) 7/8 inch (4-6" Dolls) 1 inch (8-10" Dolls) 1-1/2 inch (12-16" Dolls) 2 inch (18-20" Dolls) STOCKINETTE TUBING: 2 inch (9-16" Dolls) 3 inch (18-20" Dolls)

name: 8" Pocket Love Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 8" Pocket Love Waldorf doll. Sized for Pockets, Lunch Baskets and Small, Loving Hands. The Pocket Love Doll's separate limbs are sewn together for firmness with flexibility. Not the easiest doll, but fun to make and sew clothes for too. SKILL LEVEL: This is an Intermediate kit and is recommended for someone with Doll Making experience. KIT INCLUDES: * Cotton Doll Skin Fabric * Inner Head Tubing * Hair Yarn * Embroidery floss for eyes & mouth (Black, Blue, Green, Brown & Pink) * Wool Stuffing * Craft String and Neck Tying string to form the head * A Stuffing Stick * Boy or Girl Fabric for outfit (your choice) * Joy's Pattern for this doll & clothing. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles. The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.
****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: 1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 3. Choose either a Boy or Girl doll kit and let us know your choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 4. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Inner Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart using the links below.
Pre-Sewn Body Service
Pre-Formed Head Service

If you require a pre-made wig for this kit, please contact us for details. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General doll making tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this doll. Such as 3" & 5" Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape (or Joy's Copper Head Frames), Ball Point Pins, #7 Embroidery Needles, matching thread, Beeswax Blush and a Crochet hook for the wig. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: 6" Teeny Baby Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 6" Teeny Baby Waldorf doll. Now you can make your big doll its very own baby, complete with a sling, a diaper, and a knit fabric bunting and hat set. It only 6" tall and easy to make. SKILL LEVEL: This is a great beginners kit. KIT INCLUDES: * Cotton Doll Skin Fabric * Inner Head Tubing * Hair Yarn * Embroidery floss for eyes & mouth (Black, Blue, Green, Brown & Pink) * Wool Stuffing * Craft String and Neck Tying string to form the head * A Stuffing Stick * Boy, Girl or Neutral Fabric for Bunting outfit, the sling and for the diaper (your choice) * Joy's Pattern for this doll, sling & clothing. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete the doll, sling, clothing and hair styles. The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.
****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: 1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 3. Choose either Boy, Girl or Neutral fabric for the Bunting Outfit & Sling and let us know your choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. Fabrics are picked by us but please feel free to let us know if there is a particular color you would prefer. 4. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Inner Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart using the links below.
Pre-Sewn Body Service
Pre-Formed Head Service

If you require a pre-made wig for this kit, please contact us for details. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General doll making tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this doll. Such as 3" & 5" Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape (or Joy's Copper Head Frames), Ball Point Pins, #7 Embroidery Needles, matching thread, Beeswax Blush and a Crochet hook for the wig. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: 12" Bright Eyes Baby Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 12" Bright Eyes Baby Waldorf Doll. Such a wonderful and simple doll for a baby or toddler. The thick Velour body is it's clothes - just perfect for those little hands that can't change clothes yet. A good doll kit & pattern to learn some basic sewing and doll making skills. SKILL LEVEL: This is a great beginners kit and a wonderful kit for kids (13 and older) to use as well. KIT INCLUDES: * Cotton Doll Skin Fabric * Inner Head Tubing * Velour Fabric for the Doll Body * Hair Yarn * Embroidery floss for eyes & mouth (Black, Blue, Green, Brown & Pink) * Wool Stuffing * Craft String and Neck Tying string to form the head * A Stuffing Stick * Boy or Girl Fabric for outfit (your choice) * Joy's Pattern for this doll. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete the doll and hair styles.
****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: 1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 3. Choose a Velour Color for the doll's body (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 4. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Inner Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart using the links below.
Pre-Sewn Body Service
Pre-Formed Head Service

If you require a pre-made wig for this kit, please contact us for details. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General doll making tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this doll. Such as 3" & 5" Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape (or Joy's Copper Head Frames), Ball Point Pins, #7 Embroidery Needles, matching thread, Beeswax Blush and a Crochet hook for the wig. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: 10" & 6" Bunting Baby Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 10" & 6" Bunting Baby Waldorf dolls.  2 Dolls in one Kit!

They are soft cotton velour baby dolls for the very young to snuggle. A wonderful first doll for a child. This is a wonderful beginners kit. Having the 2 sizes, 6" and 10", gives plenty of practice in sewing and beginning doll making skills.  Velour, as a rule, can be challenging to sew, either by hand or machine, but with Joy’s technique it will be a breeze.

This is a great beginners kit and a wonderful kit for kids (13 and older) to use as well.

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, Velour, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for this doll. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll & clothing.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles.

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

1. Choose a Velour Color for your dolls from the drop-down menu.

2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your dolls and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

3. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: 16" Baby Companion Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 16" Baby Companion Waldorf doll.

The Baby Companion Doll's separate limbs are sewn together for firmness and stability. Even though it is the most difficult doll to make, out of Joy's Waldorf Doll patterns it is a very satisfying doll to make. Baby Companion is a doll that can take being slept all over and dragged everywhere.

This is an Intermediate to advanced kit and is recommended for someone with Doll Making experience.

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, hair yarn, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for this doll. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles. Fabric for Doll's clothes are also needed.

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. Please note that the "Big Loops Mohair Boucle' Yarns will add $5 to your kit.

2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

3. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head, Pre-Sewn Doll Body or Pre-Made wig, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

This is an Intermediate to advanced kit and is recommended for someone with Doll Making experience.

name: Cotton Knit Premium Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric by De Witte Engel
description:
Cotton Knit Premium Waldorf Doll Skin Fabric 
Made by De Witte Engel
100% Cotton
Width: 32 inches (80 cm)

This is our Premium Doll Skin Fabric which is made of high quality 100% Cotton Interlock Knit Fabric. It is 32" (80cm) wide in a tubular knit.

Choose from 1/2 yard or 1 yard cuts in your choice of color.  For multiple yard cuts of the same color, we cut in one continuous piece.  For example if you purchase 3 quantity of 1 yard Salmon we will send you a 3 yard piece.

When choosing a color, remember that the shade of the fabric gets lighter on a doll once it's stuffed.

Choose from 1 yard or 1/2 yard cuts in the drop-down menu.  Full yards are $21.49.  Half yards are $12.49.  This is a SALE price.  Regular prices are: $14 for half yard and $28 for full yards.

This fabric has been made especially for Waldorf Doll Making and has a perfect weight, a moderate stretch, a pill-resistant finish and stuffs up wonderfully.  This fabric is also free of harmful chemicals.

De Witte Engel is very highly regarded in the Waldorf Doll making community and their doll skin fabric is considered the gold standard for doll making.

name: 6" Star Child Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 6" Star Child Waldorf doll.

This is a great doll for the very young to snuggle.  Star Child's body is made of the softest cotton velour, which also serves as this little sweetie's clothes. 

This is a great beginners kit.

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, velour fabric, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for this doll.  The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles. 

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

2.  Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

3.  If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: 16" Button Child Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 16" Button Child.

The 16" Button Child's arms and legs are button jointed allowing for different poses, the ability to sit without assistance and to stand when posed just right. This is a shapely doll with a little bum and lovely legs and feet.  

This is an Intermediate kit and is recommended for someone with Doll Making experience.  

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, hair yarn, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for these dolls.  The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles. Fabric for Doll's clothes are also needed.

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. Please note that the "Big Loops Mohair Boucle' Yarns will add $5 to your kit.

3.  If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head, Pre-Sewn Doll Body or Pre-Made wig, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

name: 16" Button Baby & 9" Tiny Button Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 16" Button Baby & 9" Tiny Button Waldorf dolls.  Two dolls in one kit!

16" Button Baby and 9" Tiny Button's arms and legs are button jointed allowing for different poses, the ability to sit in the center of the bed without assistance and hold some posing. These are shapely dolls with cute little bums and lovely legs and feet.

This is an Intermediate kit and is recommended for someone with Doll Making experience.  

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, hair yarn, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for these dolls.  The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.

name: 10" Brother or Sister Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 10" Brother or Sister Waldorf doll.

Similar in body style of the 16" Honey, but, with a more simple style of clothes for younger hands to dress.  A good kit for those with some doll making experience but, many have done well as beginners.

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, hair yarn, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for this doll.  The kit also comes with your choice of velour colors to make the top & pants.  The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles. 

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu.  Please note that the "Big Loops Mohair Boucle" Yarns will add $5 to your kit.

2.  Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

3.  Choose 2 Velour Colors for your Top, Pants & Shoes (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choices in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

4.  If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head, Pre-Sewn Doll Body or Pre-Made wig, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: Joy's Copper Doll Head Frames
description:
Making your own doll head with the aid of Joy's Copper Head Frames will make for a perfectly proportioned & sized doll head every time.
If you have ever been to one of Joy's doll making workshops, or have seen her DVD, you will have seen Joy demonstrate this amazing tool.
 
You will find that you will be using these frames several times each time you make a doll head.

Designed by Joy Chambers of Joy's Waldorf Dolls.

Labeled and sized for dolls that are 6", 8", 9/10", 12", 13/14", 16" and 18" tall.

name: 16" Honey Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 16" Honey Waldorf doll.

This sturdy, medium sized doll has a soft, flexible body, with shapely legs and feet that can wear wool felt shoes and sneakers. 

This kit comes complete with cotton Doll skin fabric, inner head tubing, hair yarn, embroidery floss for eyes & mouth, wool stuffing, craft string and neck tying string to form the head, a stuffing stick, and Joy's Pattern for this doll.  The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles.

The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.

General doll making tools are required (not included in the kit) such as Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles. Fabric for Doll's clothes are also needed.

****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions:

1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 

2.  Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout.

3.  If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Head, Pre-Sewn Doll Body or Pre-Made wig, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart from our "Kits" category.

Please contact us if you require further information.program.

name: Pre-Formed Head Service for Waldorf Doll Kit
description: If you are purchasing one of our kits and would like to have your doll's head pre-formed, please purchase this item. This price is per head so if you are purchasing a kit that makes two dolls, please purchase this item twice. ***IMPORTANT NOTE*** Doll heads are made to order and require 5-7 full business days to complete with the purchase of a kit. Baby Jess heads are currently not available as part of our Head Service but will be soon.

name: Pre-Sewn Body Service for Waldorf Doll Kit
description:
If you are purchasing one of our kits and would like to have your doll body pre-sewn, please purchase this item.

The price is per doll body so if you are purchasing a kit containing two dolls, please purchase this item twice.

name: 13" Little Love Waldorf Doll Making Kit
description:
This is a Joy's Waldorf Kit to make your very own 13" Little Love Waldorf doll. Little Love is the "traditional" Waldorf doll who will soon become inseparable from its Mommy or Daddy. The Little Love's body and legs are of one piece for firmness, sturdiness with flexibility. A wonderful size as a first dress-up doll that will be taken everywhere. SKILL LEVEL: This is a wonderful Beginner's kit. KIT INCLUDES: * Cotton Doll Skin Fabric * Inner Head Tubing * Hair Yarn * Embroidery floss for eyes & mouth (Black, Blue, Green, Brown & Pink) * Wool Stuffing * Craft String and Neck Tying string to form the head * A Stuffing Stick * Joy's Pattern for this doll & clothing. The pattern features easy to use, step-by-step instructions along with re-useable pattern pieces to complete the doll, clothing and hair styles. The finished doll is recommended for children 3 and older.
****IMPORTANT KIT ORDERING INFORMATION****
When ordering this kit please follow these instructions: 1. Choose a Hair Yarn Color & Type from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose a Skin Tone (see photos) for your doll and let us know your color choice in a "Message to Seller" during checkout. 3. If you require additional services such as a Pre-Formed Inner Head or Pre-Sewn Doll Body, please add the appropriate service item to your shopping cart using the links below.
Pre-Sewn Body Service
Pre-Formed Head Service

If you require a pre-made wig for this kit, please contact us for details. ADDITIONAL SUPPLIES NEEDED: General doll making tools (not included in the kit) are needed to complete this doll. Such as 3" & 5" Doll Making needles, Ball point hand and sewing machines needles, Measuring Tape (or Joy's Copper Head Frames), Ball Point Pins, #7 Embroidery Needles, matching thread, Beeswax Blush and a Crochet hook for the wig. These items are available here:
Doll Making Supplies

Please contact us if you require further information.

name: Mohair Smooth Waldorf Doll Hair Yarn
description:
A fluffy and smooth, straight mohair yarn to create a soft & natural looking head of hair.  This yarn can be brushed to create wonderful hair styles.

It is made of 78% Mohair, 13% Wool and 9% Nylon and comes in a 1.75 oz. (50 gram) skein. 

Comes in 24 wonderful hair colors.

Colors can show up differently on each device. If color matching is important, please order one of our Hair Yarn color swatch cards. Also see our extra pictures by clicking the arrows under the pictures.

name: Wool/Mohair Worsted Waldorf Doll Hair Yarn
description:
This is a lovely, soft & straight hair yarn.  This hair yarn will create a bit of a chunky hair look for your doll.  We love mixing this yarn with strands of the straight & thin mohair yarn to create wonderful hair styles.

This is also wonderful yarn for general knitting projects.

It is made of 85% Wool, 15% Mohair and comes in a 4oz. (113 gram) skein.  Length approx. 190 yards (173m)

Comes in 12 wonderful hair colors.

Colors can show up differently on each device.  If color matching is important, please order one of our Hair Yarn color swatch cards. Also see our extra pictures by clicking the arrows under the pictures.

name: Mohair Locks Boucle Waldorf Doll Hair Yarn by De Witte Engel
description:
Mohair Locks Doll Hair (Puppengarn)
Made by De Witte Engel in Holland.

This is a nice, soft & very thick Mohair Boucle yarn.  Great for creating big loops on your doll's hair.

It is made of 74% Mohair, 17% Wool and 9% Nylon and comes in a 1.8oz. (50 gram) skein.  Length approx. 50 yards (45m)

Comes in 8 wonderful hair colors.

Colors can show up differently on each device.  If color matching is important, please order one of our Hair Yarn color swatch cards.  Also see our extra pictures by clicking the arrows under the pictures.

name: Little Holly Waldorf Nature Doll Kit
description:
This is Little Holly! A cute tiny doll that will capture your heart.

This doll is a bit easier to make than the limbed Flower Children. It is a free standing table puppet/doll. Great for play or to go on a nature table.

Finished doll size: 7cm or 2-3/4"

This Doll kit contains enough jersey, felt, wool and thread to complete your own Little Holly doll, as well as pattern instructions and cutting templates.

To make the doll you will also need scissors and a hand sewing needle which are not included.

Kit is designed by De Witte Engel.

name: Pre Made Waldorf Doll Head
description: This is a Pre-Formed Waldorf Doll Head made to order. Perfect for those who do not wish to make their own heads. Heads are made with top quality materials. Cotton Inner Head Tubing and Eco Wool. This is a Pre-made Inner Doll head, which is usually one of the most difficult parts of making a Waldorf doll. This head will still need to be covered with doll skin & finished off (embroidered, etc) to your liking. Doll skin to cover the head is not included. If you require a nose added to your doll head, please let us know with a note during checkout. ***IMPORTANT NOTE*** Pre-Formed Doll heads are in high demand and are each made to order. During busy times they may take up to 4 weeks to complete. If you need to know our exact current work time, please"Contact Us" Regular Doll Heads are available in 6 sizes. ✴ Tiny - For Dolls 5-6" tall (12-15cm) ✴ Extra Small - For Dolls 7-8" tall (17-20cm) ✴ Small - For Dolls 9-10" tall (22-25cm) ✴ Medium - For Dolls 11-12" tall (27-30cm) ✴ Large - For Dolls 13-14" tall (33-35cm) ✴ Extra Large - For Dolls 15-16" tall (38-41cm) Pre-made Doll Heads are also available for those of you making a doll using a Joy's Waldorf Dolls pattern. Please choose the correct doll head for the doll you are making as the doll heads for Joy's Waldorf dolls are finished off a little differently than the regular doll heads. Joy's Waldorf Dolls Pre-made Doll heads are available for the following dolls: ✴ 6" Teeny Baby ✴ 10" Brother/Sister ✴ 13" Little Love ✴ 16" Honey ✴ 16" Button Child ✴ 9" Button Baby ✴ 16" Button Baby ✴ 6" Velour Star ✴ 6" Velour Bunting Baby ✴ 10" Velour Bunting Baby ✴ 8" Pocket Love ✴ 12" Bright Eyes ✴ 14" Baby Companion ✴ 16" Baby Companion

name: Embroidery Floss for Doll Eyes & Mouth
description:
Embroidery Floss for your Doll's Eyes & Mouth.

Each skein is made up of 6 strands of high quality 100% Cotton floss and is 8.7 yards (8m) in length. A brilliant; six-strand floss made from double mercerized; long staple 100% cotton fibers.  A must have for Doll Makers!

Made in France

Available in a variety of lovely color shades so you can choose exactly what you want for your Doll's eyes & mouth

See additional pictures for close-ups of all of the colors available.

name: Beeswax Blush for Doll Cheeks - Crayon or Block
description:
This Beeswax Blush is perfect for giving your dolls cheeks a soft blush.  Add more Beeswax blush for a more pronounced blush look.

It comes in either a STICK Crayon or BLOCK Crayon format and includes a small application cloth.

It's easy to use.  Simply rub the beeswax blush onto the cloth and then use the cloth to apply the blush to your dolls cheeks.

Available in 5 color shades.

name: Doll Skin Fabric Color Swatch Card
description:
This Color Swatch Card includes small samples of each type and color of Doll Skin Fabric we currently carry.

It includes our Regular Doll Skin as well as our Premium Doll Skin.

name: Cotton Velour Fabric for Waldorf Dolls
description:
Cotton Velour Fabric
Width: 60" (153 cm)

A beautiful plush & velvety cotton velour fabric with a slight stretch perfect for doll making.    

This fabric is has a polyester blend knit backing for stability.  It is made of 80% cotton, 20% polyester.

Choose from 1/4 yard, 1/2 yard or 1 yard cuts in your choice of color in the drop-down menu.

Quarter yards - $3.99
Half yards - $6.99 
Full Yards - $11.25

Please note that colors can show up differently on each computer monitor.  If you need to color match, we recommend that you purchase one of our velour color cards.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls 16" Honey Dollmaking Sewing Pattern
description:
16" HONEY WALDORF DOLL MAKING PATTERN

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 16" Honey Waldorf inspired Doll.

This sturdy, medium sized doll has a soft, flexible body, with shapely legs and feet that can wear wool felt shoes and sneakers.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make this wonderful 16" Honey Doll, Overalls, Shirt, Dress and several Hairstyles

For a list of materials needed to complete this doll, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this doll available for purchase. 
Please see our SUPPLIES category or purchase a complete KIT to make this doll.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls 8" Pocket Love Dollmaking Sewing Pattern
description:
8" POCKET LOVE WALDORF DOLL MAKING PATTERN

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 8" Pocket Love Waldorf inspired Doll.

Sized for Pockets, Lunch Baskets and Small, Loving Hands. This is a newly updated pattern with full wig making instructions and a new overalls pattern for both boy and girl. The Pocket Love Doll's separate limbs are sewn together for firmness with flexibility. Not the easiest doll, but fun to make and sew for.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make this wonderful 8" Pocket Love Doll, Dress, Panties, Overalls, Shirt and full wig-making instructions.

For a list of materials needed to complete this doll, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this doll available for purchase.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make this wonderful 6" Teeny Baby doll, diaper, bunting outfit and a sling for Teeny baby to be carried in by the big doll.

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 6" & 10" Bunting Baby Waldorf inspired Doll. A perfect pattern to make your Child's First Doll.

Soft cotton Velour baby doll for the very young to snuggle. This is a wonderful beginner or children's pattern. Suggested for 9 years or older. Having the 2 sizes - 6" and 10" dolls in one pattern gives plenty of practice in sewing and beginning doll-making skills - Velour as a rule is not easy to sew, both by hand or machine, but, with our techniques, it will not be a problem.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make these very cute 6" and 10" Bunting Baby Dolls.

This is a pattern to make a 16" Button Child Waldorf inspired Doll.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls 12" Bright Eyes Baby Doll Dollmaking Sewing Pattern
description:
12" BRIGHT EYES BABY WALDORF DOLL MAKING PATTERN

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 12" Bright Eyes Baby Waldorf inspired Doll. A perfect pattern designed for you to make your Child's First Doll.

Such a wonderful and simple doll for a baby or toddler to play and cuddle with. The thick Velour body is it's clothes - just perfect for those little hands that can't change clothes yet. A good doll pattern to learn some basic sewing and doll-making skills.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make this wonderful 12" Bright Eyes Baby Doll.

For a list of materials needed to complete this doll, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this doll available for purchase. 
Please see our SUPPLIES category or purchase a complete KIT to make this doll.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls 14" Baby Companion Doll Dollmaking Sewing Pattern
description:
14" BABY COMPANION WALDORF DOLL MAKING PATTERN

Make your own Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a 14" Baby Companion Waldorf inspired Doll.

This Baby Companion Doll's separate limbs are sewn together for firmness and stability. This is a very satisfying doll to make even though I feel it is the most difficult. If one can really curb the tendency to over-stuffing, then, all will be well. Baby Companion is a doll that can take being slept all over and dragged everywhere. It is easy to repair, so you won't be bothered as much as with a button-jointed doll. This baby will need many baths in the sink with luke-warm water!

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make this wonderful 14" Baby Companion Doll, Nightgown, Nightsac and Diaper.

For a list of materials needed to complete this doll, see the additional photos for this item.

We have the items needed to make this doll available for purchase. 
Please see our SUPPLIES category or purchase a complete KIT to make this doll.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Doll Wig Making Instructions Pattern
description:
Make your own Hair Wigs for Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern/instruction booklet made by Joy Chambers.

For those of you who would like to learn to make your own doll wigs from scratch, Joy's Wig Making booklet has all of the patterns and techniques to help eliminate the guesswork.

Pattern/Instruction booklet comes complete with detailed instructions & diagrams to make 13 different Hairstyles for 13"/14" & 18" Waldorf inspired dolls.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Doll Clothing Pattern for 13", 14" & 16" Dolls
description:
Make your own clothing for Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a collection of outfits for 13", 14" & 16" Waldorf inspired Dolls.

Create an Entire Wardrobe for Your Doll. Included with these pattern are: dress, pinafore, pantaloons, panties, shorts, shortalls, overalls, jumper, blouse, shirt, t-shirt, nightgown, diaper and pajamas- for all three sized dolls! For those with basic machine sewing and pattern usage experience.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make an amazing collection of clothing for your dolls.

Detailed material lists are included with the pattern and vary depending on the clothing you are making. 

For a list of materials needed to complete these clothes, see additional photos.

We have the items needed to make these clothes available for purchase.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Multicultural Doll Clothing Pattern for 13" & 16" Dolls
description:
Make your own Multicultural clothing for Waldorf inspired dolls by using this wonderful pattern made by Joy Chambers.

This is a pattern to make a collection of outfits for 13" & 16" Waldorf inspired Dolls.

A wonderful collection of the five individualized outfits. Included are: Blackfoot Native American, Central American Hispanic, Okinawan Japanese, Mandarin Chinese and West African.

Pattern comes complete with detailed instructions, diagrams and pattern pieces to make an amazing collection of clothing for your dolls.

Detailed material lists are included with the pattern and vary depending on the clothing you are making.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Joy's Dollmaker Stuffing Tool
description:
A wonderful tool designed by Joy Chambers. Made specifically for stuffing Waldorf Inspired dolls.

Designed and highly recommended by Joy for expert stuffing of the limbs of any doll and to reduce hand fatigue of the zealous doll maker.

It does come with Instructions for use.

name: Joy's Waldorf Dolls Waldorf Dollmaking DVD
description:
Joy shares her doll making techniques in a 2 hour+ DVD. Follow along in the comfort of your home while making a doll head using the Copper Head Frames gauge, stuffing the body with Joy's Stuffing Tool, hand sewing from knot making to the invisible stitch, facial embroidery and wig attachment. Joy will also show you how to crochet her doll wigs from mohair tuft to the long, Multi-styling wigs! Learn how to make the 16" Honey and 10" Brother/Sister doll, the Baby Companions, the 13" Little Love and our Button-jointed dolls.

Patterns for the dolls featured in this DVD are sold separately. 

See our Waldorf Doll Making PATTERNS category for them.
